Description of incident: "A local merchant sent a package with shredded documents containing protected health information (PHI) from the covered entity (CE), South Sunflower County Hospital, used as packing material."The information compromised included dates of service, providers names, diagnoses, patient names, Social Security numbers, and dates of birth. More Information: https://ocrportal.hhs.gov/ocr/breach/breach_report.jsf;jsessionid=9BF4AF...
